channel.title: How to add talk-to option to a monster?
channel.description:
Title says it basically I don't know how to do that or if thats even possible, I'm using a Dementhium 637 source. Regardless of the source can anybody help ? I want a monster to be able to talk and maybe even have a shop
I AM NOT ASKING HOW TO ADD A SHOP.

item.title: How to add talk-to option to a monster?
item.dc:creator: @saintscape saintscape
item.description:
@saintscape wrote:

IDK if this will help but in 317 its in the Cleint class5.java

if(i == 1860) { //change 3046 to npc id aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; class5.aStringArray66[2] = "Pickpocket"; //second click option class5.aString65 = "Monster MAN!"; //npc name class5.aByteArray89 = "Holy shit, he's a goddamn Monster all right!!!".getBytes(); //examine info }

Read full topic
item.source: How to add talk-to option to a monster?
